item.title: Denis Villeneuve Breaks Down The Significance Of One Of His Favorite Shots In Dune 2: "I Did That Shot And Knew I Had A Movie"
item.description: Denis Villeneuve names one of his favorite shots in Dune: Part Two and breaks down how it matches his vision for his Frank Herbert adaptation.

item.title: Don't Be Surprised If Dwayne Johnson Gets His Own Animated Franchise After Moana 2
item.description: The box office success of Moana 2 will certainly yield more projects including Moana and Maui, and it makes sense for Dwayne Johnson to star in one.

item.title: Zoe Saldaña Wants Motion Capture Performances To Be Recognized By Awards Shows: "A Shame To Overlook The Sacrifices & The Work"
item.description: Zoe Saldaña has worked with motion capture through her role in the Avatar franchise, and she believes these performances deserve awards attention.
